data.name: Escape from Rowei
data.detailed_description:
Year 2056, the Earth collapsed and the last survivors decided to embark on a journey into the deepest space in search
of a planet that could host them.

Rowei looked like the perfect planet, but after a few years something goes wrong ...

Did the land colonizers have brought Rowei to collapse too?

Find out with Leycla!

Will you be able to save yourself or will you disappear along with the planet?

- Take on 100 puzzle missions in a horror setting.
- Explore the environment around you to "evolve" Leycla.
- Team up with the characters you meet
- Choose your destiny in a multiple choice story
- Create combinations of equipment to better face the challenges
- Turn-based combat

data.short_description: Strategic puzzle, your every choice will be decisive to save Leycla or not!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8 or 10
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 4 GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8 or 10
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 4 GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

data.legal_notice:
ATTENTION:
Any reference to existing people or to actual events is purely coincidental. The facts and dialogues narrated in this game are free expression of the author's imagination and have no claim to historical value or truth.
